channel.title: MYB

item.title: UFC Legend Retires In The Octagon At UFC 315 ‘I Can’t Do This Anymore’
item.description: Jose Aldo announces his retirement after a controversial loss to Aiemann Zahabi at UFC 315, ending a legendary MMA career with a record of 32-10.
